definition: picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility

sentences.english: You neednt worry, my little treasure.
B： Don't worry. You will meet nice people that will help you.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，你會遇到貴人相助。

sentences.english: Don’t worry about mother, I’ll cover for you this time.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心媽媽那邊，這一次我會爲你掩護的。

sentences.english: Have you remained silent in an English conversation because you were afraid of saying something wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你是否因爲擔心自己會講錯英文而在交流時保持沉默？

sentences.english: If you have doubts, have it tested and/or get a Brita filter pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還擔心，測試下水質，或者買個純淨水過濾器。

sentences.english: His coach Sun Haiping said he was worried about the great pressure on Liu Xiang at this time.
sentences.chinese: 教練孫海平對劉翔此次所承受的壓力錶示擔心。

sentences.english: Albert Einstein's parents feared he was sub-normal.
sentences.chinese: 愛因斯坦的父母當初曾經擔心他發育不正常。

sentences.english: That way, they wouldn’t have to worry about encountering poachers and other dangerous humans.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就不必擔心他們遭遇偷獵者和其他危險分子了。

sentences.english: The drug trafficker is concerned about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.chinese: 毒品販子擔心傳統音樂會的狀況。

sentences.english: Yes , just like we were about you .
sentences.chinese: 是啊，就像我們剛纔擔心你一樣。

sentences.english: At first glance, students' fears also seem warranted.
sentences.chinese: 咋一看，學生們的擔心也是對的。

sentences.english: He was worried about what might happen if they leaked out information.
sentences.chinese: 他擔心萬一他們走漏了風聲會出什麼事。

sentences.english: It is not just foreigners who worry.
sentences.chinese: 擔心這個問題的不僅是外國人。

sentences.english: Policymakers may be starting to worry that asset prices are running up too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 決策層可能已經開始擔心資產價格的過快增長。

sentences.english: Pregnant mothers may also be concerned about eating fish because of the mercury content.
sentences.chinese: 準媽媽也對喫魚有顧慮，擔心其汞含量超標。

sentences.english: Trade on the net, most those who make a person afraid is con.
sentences.chinese: 網上交易，最讓人擔心的是欺詐。

definition: to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
